    Reference

    Loading and Processing Contigs

    Functions that load, combine, and process the single-cell contig information.

    addVariable()

    Adding variables after the combination of clonotypes.

    combineBCR()

    Combining the list of B cell receptor contigs into clonotypes

    combineTCR()

    Combining the list of T cell receptor contigs into clonotypes

    createHTOContigList()

    Generate a contig list from a multiplexed experiment

    exportClones()

    Exporting clonotypes

    loadContigs()

    Loading the contigs derived from single-cell sequencing

    subsetClones()

    Subset the product of combineTCR() or combineBCR()

    Visualizing Clones

    Functions plotting clonal data.

    clonalAbundance()

    Demonstrate the relative abundance of clonotypes by group or sample.

    clonalCluster()

    Clustering adaptive receptor sequences

    clonalCompare()

    Demonstrate the difference in clonal proportion between clones

    clonalDiversity()

    Examine the clonal diversity of samples

    clonalHomeostasis()

    Examining the clonal homeostasis

    clonalLength()

    Demonstrate the distribution of lengths filtered clones

    clonalOverlap()

    Examining the clonal overlap between groups or samples

    clonalProportion()

    Examining the clonal space occupied by specific clonotypes

    clonalQuant()

    Quantify the unique clonotypes

    clonalRarefaction()

    Calculate rarefaction based on the abundance of clones

    clonalScatter()

    Scatter plot comparing the expansion of two samples

    clonalSizeDistribution()

    Hierarchical clustering of clones using Gamma-GPD spliced threshold model

    vizGenes()

    Visualizing the distribution of gene usage

    Summarizing Repertoire

    Functions to summarize clonal sequences across the repertoire.

    percentAA()

    Examining the relative amino acid composition by position

    percentGenes()

    Examining the V or J gene usage across groupings

    percentKmer()

    Examining the relative composition of kmer motifs

    percentVJ()

    Examining the V or J gene usage across groupings

    Single-Cell Object Processing and Visualizations

    Functions to add or visualize clonal information along a single-cell object.

    alluvialClones()

    Exploring interaction of clonotypes by single-cell object dynamics

    clonalBias()

    Examine clonotype bias

    clonalNetwork()

    Visualize clonal network along reduced dimensions

    clonalOccupy()

    Visualize the number of single cells with cloneSizes by cluster

    clonalOverlay()

    Visualize distribution of clonal frequency overlaid on dimensional reduction plots

    combineExpression()

    Adding clonotype information to a single-cell object

    getCirclize()

    Generate data frame to be used with circlize R package to visualize clonotypes as a chord diagram.

    highlightClones()

    Highlighting specific clonotypes in Seurat

    StartracDiversity()

    Startrac-based diversity indices for single-cell RNA-seq

    Data

    Reference data for package functions.

    contig_list

    A list of 8 single-cell T cell receptor sequences runs.

    mini_contig_list

    Processed subset of `contig_list`

    scRep_example

    A Seurat object of 500 single T cells,

    Contents

    Developed by Nick Borcherding, Qile Yang.
